Ten years and this game is still one of the best Adventure First Person Shooters I've played.

But why is this game such a good one, you ask? Well, if you've already played the first Half-LIfe, this is basically the same except a hundred times better in every field. More immersive story, new weapons, new minor and major characters, and HUUUGE graphic improvements with bugs and glitches few and far between. My only problem is that the lighting tends to glitch out at random intervals and requires you to restart the game to [i]maybe[/i] fix it.
If you haven't? Well, I guess you'll have to trust me that you're in for one hell of a story for this one. Even (mostly) during the cinematic parts, you still have minor control over the game. Practically everything else is left for you to do.

The story starts with Gordon Freeman, a Theoretical Physicist and former Black Mesa employee, newly arriving in a mysterious place called City Seventeen. Eventually after wandering around in the train station you meet an old friend Barney Calhoun, also a former Black Mesa Employee. Before you know it, you're running around in an apartment building being chased by the police.
The rest of the story is for you to experience.

Trust me, this game is worth your ten bucks.

The game maintains its value as a fun, functioning game even a decade after its release. While it might be a bit dated compared to modern shooters, its still very fun to play and contains quite a bit of action.
Great game, one of the best single player FPS games, with a great story line, it has everything

[b]«Я видел каждый божий день,
Как на дома кривых трущоб,
Свою распространяет тень
Высокий, синий небоскрёб»[/b]

[u][i]© Александр Сидман[/i][/u]

[h1]«Наши покровители»[/h1]

Нас пищей, кровом и работой
Одарили наши покровители,
Окружив вокруг своей заботой,
Хоть мы ни разу их не видели.

По монитору близ домов
Стекает чья-то кровь,
А доктор Брин потоком слов
Пропагандирует любовь.

На стенах в ряд следы от пуль,
И не найдёшь в трущобах мест,
Куда бы ни проник патруль,
Чуть будет что не так – арест.

И дубинкой ударяют в нос,
Едва патрульные завидели,
Того, кто смел задать вопрос:
Так кто же наши покровители?

Вступай к нам в клуб, зови с собой друзей, комментируй и ставь лайки. Чтобы не пропустить новые стихотворения, подписывайся на нас в качестве куратора!!![/code]

Отличная игра для любителей экшена, но вот остаеться один вопрос, когда будет следующая часть?

You play as Garbanzo "The Edge" Frohman as he wakes up from his really long power nap from the Straight Up G-Man. Everything sucks after spooky aliens came and did pretty bad stuff. You meet a girl named Albatross Vogue who is independent and don't take no guff from nobody. She wisks you away on a magical adventure to teach you the meaning of life and that girls just want to have fun. You get some pretty good controls with the game and they give you a suit which makes you run almost as fast as Usain Bolt. They like to mix up the gameplay with a boat and you drive around on the boat doing boat stuff. This game also has really spooky things in a city called Raviolihome that made me poop myself in fear. Also Fratman never says anything because he lost his ability to speak in a skee-ball accident. With that said, 65 Shrek 2 DVD's out of 71 Sega Saturns.

I bought this from a sense of nostalgia, and what an eye-opener! Despite it's age, it blows away competition! It's fast ,hellishly engaging, and looks gorgeous (did they tweak the textures?) The mixture of FPS/Puzzling is great, as are the variety of vehicles to control. Something for everyone. If you have been living under a rock, and never heard of it, get it or regret it!

This Game is seriously awesome! I love the Half Life Series and this is my favorite game in the series so far. The graphics are minutely under their best at some parts, but after that the game world looks fantastic, especially in the citadel. That just looks amazing. It helps to have this game for Garry's Mod so that searching for parts to build things is easy. I give this a 10 out f 10

The HL series is amazing; great story depth and development, interesting characters, and fantastic gameplay. The orignal HL was brilliant in and of its own right; however, HL2 has so much more to offer in terms of, well, everything. The graphics are far better, the story line is more indepth, the FPS action is amazing, and you get to wear the iconic orange HEV suit again!

Play this entire series now!

Probably the best single-player game I have ever played on PC. The Source engine has a great eye for detail; portrays a realistic picture of a totalitarian regime, which kindles a real sense of sympathy with the rebels; a squad-system (although not the best); likeable, unique and realistic characters; varied gameplay and locations with some particularly epic parts like Ravenholm (which even now, 10 years later, still gives me the creeps), the hovercraft and buggy scenes, and your first Strider-confrontation; cool weapons; smart AI; an enormous amount of different enemies to shoot; a great story; a great momentum in the game (action-packed and serene scenes alternate nicely); an enjoyable soundtrack adapted to every moment (cf. combat, Ravenholm, etc.), good voice-acting and great sound-effects (anyone not creeped out by the zombie-dogs?); smart puzzles (but just some really stand out), great use of physics; and one of the best first hours of gameplay ever (with a great sense of dependence, realism and adrenaline).

10/10
only play this game if you love awesome gameplay, groundbreaking character actualisation, fantastic story, and the patience to wait a decade for a sequel. the first three helps to offset the last.
Truly the best game of the past 15 years. play this game. it will enrich your life

So, you might be reading this trying to figure out whether or not you want to buy Half Life 2.

I got HL2 along with every other half life via a Steam Sale, and I can go ahead and tell you that Half Life 2 alone would be one of the best purchasing deals you'll ever make. Ever.

Set in the somewhat near future, Half Life 2 takes players to a polluted and desolate Earth infested with dangerous creatures and the ruthless Combine, an alien race bent on the complete domination of the universe. Fans of George Orwell's 1984 can relate to the dystopian state that players are first thrust into.

The gameplay is really excellent, sort of like a first person puzzler. In the middle of combat, players can utilize the environment, objects, and even other enemies to defeat foes. Strategic decisions are commonplace, and "environmental combat" is rewarded by gaining the advantage over the brainwashed minions of the Combine.

I could go on, but the game really does a good job of telling the story, so I'll just quit typing and let you make the choice: whether you want to play an awesome game jam-packed with an awesome story, mods, and an experience like no other.

2004 год, наверное, был одним из лучших в плане игр. Вышли продолжения многих ожидаемых проектов. Среди таких и была Half-Life 2.
Новый движок Source позволил воплотить разработчикам все идеи в данной игре. Графика была потясающей. Многие игровые издания отмечали очень реалистичную воду и физику всего в этом удивительном мире.
Именно начиная с этой игры Valve начали активно продвигать сервис Steam. На диске с игрой присутствовала эта программа. И ставилась вместе халвой. У многих возникали с ней проблемы. Потому что обновления качались именно через стим, а в то время интернет у всех был слабенький.
Озвучка. Оригинальная озвучка выполнена восхитительно, чего не скажешь о первоначальной русской. Сейчас ситуация более-менее исправилась.
Сюжет. После первой части, когда загадочный G-Man поместил Гордона в стазис, он его пробуждает и говорит, что время доктора пришло. Пробуждается доктор в поезде и видит последствия каскадного резонанса из первой игры - планета Земля захвачена неким Альянсом, каждый человек теперь имеет порядковый номер и служит как раб для инопланетян, работая в буквальном смысле за еду. Гордону нужно остановить это непотребство и освободить планету!
Играется всё так же бодро. К покупке обязательно!

Жаль, что Valve как разработчики игр закончили на этой игре, после неё идет уже вырвиглазный бред. В 2004 году эта игра сделала невероятный прорыв в индустрии игр, конечно игра не обошлась без минусов в основном это пробелы в сюжете. Удивительная и захватывающая дух атмосфера восточной Европы, знакомая и приятная архитектура. Пугающая атмосфера всеобщего угнетения и тоталитаризма. Постсоветский город, оккупированный комбайнами. К сожалению, большинство разработчиков покинуло valve, которые дали игре душу - Марк Лэйдлоу, Антонов, Бейли. Угнетающая музыка только больше добавляет эффект подавления. Проработанная физика и реалтаймовое освещение в 2004 заставляли людей раскрывать рты от изумления. Про сюжет, что-либо писать не буду, он прост, но в тоже время заставляет задуматься о некоторых вещях в реальной жизни, да, есть минусы в основном это несоответствие с 1 часть. В игре мало действующих героев, но каждый из них обладает харизмой, что заставляет запомнить этих героев надолго. Великолепная игра, но до идеала все равно не дотянула. Пусть лучше в памяти останется эта игра, чем Half-Life 3 Hat Edition. Пусть лучше игра не выйдет, чем валвы все испортят.

Half-Life 2 is one of the best FPSes ever made, just like the first iteration.  Many games and mods have been spawned from it's engine, and it still holds up to the test of time.  Single player, or the various mulitplayer modes, it's all good.  Expect helpful npcs that aren't complete cannon fodder, large scale enemies, platform situations, new weapons, and even a drivable vehicle.  Many chapters will keep you busy for hours, and all of them are pretty exciting.  Honestly, if you haven't played it yet, and you're an FPS nut, give it a shot.

Here it is. Half-Life 2. It's been long renowned as the definitive PC gaming experience, and not only does it meet the hype, it exceeds it. Still over 4 years old, Half-Life 2 holds its own as one of the greatest games of all time, seamlessly blending story, action, and emotion into an experience that I can nearly guarantee you won't find a trace of in modern games. Everything from the slick controls to the arsenal of individualistic weapons makes this game into the masterpiece it so very well is. The whole game is pefectly paced. Not only is it an amazing shooter, but there's so much more to be experienced. It is an inexplainable journey that every gamer who likes to shoot and beat foes with a crow bar should embarq upon.
Pourquoi jouer à ce jeu ? Parce que c'est tout simplement le meilleur du genre.

half life 2: well let me start of with the campaign. this game has a very extended campaign that is very touching.leaves of with a cliff hanger that was a little sad, but gets you to play half life 2 episode 2. but in my opinion anyone who has steam should have half life 2. its a pritty basic game that comes with multiple advantages 1 being a good campaign and another being the engin. the engin allows you to play alot more stuff like half life mods and garrys mod. your life will not be comleted without this game!

Though being a dated game, the graphics are still pretty good, and a large upgrade from the original. The gameplay is immersive and well done, although a few of the mechanics need to be explained and looked up on the web (the rocket launcher for instance). I enjoyed playing this game, and finished it in 19 hours occasionally looking at a players guide.

Maybe I missed the hype of it's release, or maybe it's because I never played the first one, but to me, Half-Life 2 seems highly overrated. It isn't BAD on any account, but it wasn't the masterpiece I was expecting. It has what I assume is a good story (I still don't understand any of it, maybe playing the first one would help), but very basic and repetitive gameplay. Half-Life 2 came with the Orange Box, and I think that is the only way I would've bought it. 7/10
